info.description:
The Selling Partner API for Catalog Items provides programmatic access to information about items in the Amazon catalog.

For more information, refer to the [Catalog Items API Use Case Guide](doc:catalog-items-api-v2022-04-01-use-case-guide).
info.title: Selling Partner API for Catalog Items

get.description:
Search for and return a list of Amazon catalog items and associated information either by identifier or by keywords.

**Usage Plans:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 2 | 2 |

The `x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit` response header returns the usage plan rate limits that were applied to the requested operation, when available. The table above indicates the default rate and burst values for this operation. Selling partners whose business demands require higher throughput may observe higher rate and burst values than those shown here. For more information, refer to the [Usage Plans and Rate Limits in the Selling Partner API](doc:usage-plans-and-rate-limits-in-the-sp-api).

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of product identifiers to search the Amazon catalog for. **Note:** Cannot be used with `keywords`.

parameters.name: identifiersType
parameters.description: Type of product identifiers to search the Amazon catalog for. **Note:** Required when `identifiers` are provided.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number.
European Article Number.
Global Trade Item Number.
International Standard Book Number.
Japanese Article Number.
Minsan Code.
Stock Keeping Unit, a seller-specified identifier for an Amazon listing. **Note:** Must be accompanied by `sellerId`.
Universal Product Code.

parameters.name: marketplaceIds
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of Amazon marketplace identifiers for the request.

parameters.name: includedData
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of data sets to include in the response. Default: `summaries`.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: A JSON object containing structured item attribute data keyed by attribute name. Catalog item attributes conform to the related Amazon product type definitions available in the Selling Partner API for Product Type Definitions.
Dimensions for an item in the Amazon catalog.
Identifiers associated with the item in the Amazon catalog, such as UPC and EAN identifiers.
Images for an item in the Amazon catalog.
Product types associated with the Amazon catalog item.
Relationship details of an Amazon catalog item (for example, variations).
Sales ranks of an Amazon catalog item.
Summary details of an Amazon catalog item. Refer to the `attributes` of an Amazon catalog item for more details.
Vendor details associated with an Amazon catalog item. Vendor details are available to vendors only.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for retrieving localized summaries. Defaults to the primary locale of the marketplace.

parameters.name: sellerId
parameters.description: A selling partner identifier, such as a seller account or vendor code. **Note:** Required when `identifiersType` is `SKU`.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of words to search the Amazon catalog for. **Note:** Cannot be used with `identifiers`.

parameters.name: brandNames
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of brand names to limit the search for `keywords`-based queries. **Note:** Cannot be used with `identifiers`.

parameters.name: classificationIds
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of classification identifiers to limit the search for `keywords`-based queries. **Note:** Cannot be used with `identifiers`.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results to be returned per page.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: A token to fetch a certain page when there are multiple pages worth of results.

parameters.name: keywordsLocale
parameters.description: The language of the keywords provided for `keywords`-based queries. Defaults to the primary locale of the marketplace. **Note:** Cannot be used with `identifiers`.

x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit.description: Your rate limit (requests per second) for this operation.

SMART TV FEATURES: OneRemote to control all compatible devices, Bixby voice command, on-screen universal guide, SmartThings to control compatible home appliances and devices, smart speaker expandability with Alexa and Google Assistant compatibility, and more

400.description: Request has missing or invalid parameters and cannot be parsed.

x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit.description: Your rate limit (requests per second) for this operation.

403.description: Indicates that access to the resource is forbidden. Possible reasons include Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, or Invalid Signature.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit.description: Your rate limit (requests per second) for this operation.

413.description: The request size exceeded the maximum accepted size.

415.description: The request payload is in an unsupported format.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

500.description: An unexpected condition occurred that prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

get.description:
Retrieves details for an item in the Amazon catalog.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 2 | 2 |

The `x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit` response header returns the usage plan rate limits that were applied to the requested operation, when available. The table above indicates the default rate and burst values for this operation. Selling partners whose business demands require higher throughput may observe higher rate and burst values than those shown here. For more information, refer to the [Usage Plans and Rate Limits in the Selling Partner API](doc:usage-plans-and-rate-limits-in-the-sp-api).

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the item.

parameters.name: marketplaceIds
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of Amazon marketplace identifiers. Data sets in the response contain data only for the specified marketplaces.

parameters.name: includedData
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of data sets to include in the response. Default: `summaries`.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: A JSON object containing structured item attribute data keyed by attribute name. Catalog item attributes conform to the related Amazon product type definitions available in the Selling Partner API for Product Type Definitions.
Dimensions for an item in the Amazon catalog.
Identifiers associated with the item in the Amazon catalog, such as UPC and EAN identifiers.
Images for an item in the Amazon catalog.
Product types associated with the Amazon catalog item.
Sales ranks of an Amazon catalog item.
Summary details of an Amazon catalog item. Refer to the "attributes" of an Amazon catalog item for more details.
Relationship details of an Amazon catalog item (for example, variations).
Vendor details associated with an Amazon catalog item. Vendor details are available to vendors only.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for retrieving localized summaries. Defaults to the primary locale of the marketplace.

x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit.description: Your rate limit (requests per second) for this operation.

403.description: Indicates that access to the resource is forbidden. Possible reasons include Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, or Invalid Signature.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit.description: Your rate limit (requests per second) for this operation.

413.description: The request size exceeded the maximum accepted size.

415.description: The request payload is in an unsupported format.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

500.description: An unexpected condition occurred that prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

Item.description: An item in the Amazon catalog.

ItemAsin.description: Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) is the unique identifier for an item in the Amazon catalog.

ItemAttributes.description: A JSON object that contains structured item attribute data keyed by attribute name. Catalog item attributes conform to the related product type definitions available in the Selling Partner API for Product Type Definitions.

ItemBrowseClassification.description: Classification (browse node) associated with an Amazon catalog item.

classificationId.description: Identifier of the classification (browse node identifier).

ItemContributor.description: Individual contributor to the creation of an item, such as an author or actor.

value.description: Name of the contributor, such as Jane Austen.

ItemContributorRole.description: Role of an individual contributor in the creation of an item, such as author or actor.

displayName.description: Display name of the role in the requested locale, such as Author or Actor.

value.description: Role value for the Amazon catalog item, such as author or actor.

Dimension.description: Individual dimension value of an Amazon catalog item or item package.

unit.description: Measurement unit of the dimension value.

Dimensions.description: Dimensions of an Amazon catalog item or item in its packaging.

height.description: Height of an item or item package.

length.description: Length of an item or item package.

weight.description: Weight of an item or item package.

width.description: Width of an item or item package.

ItemDimensions.description: Array of dimensions associated with the item in the Amazon catalog by Amazon marketplace.

ItemDimensionsByMarketplace.description: Dimensions associated with the item in the Amazon catalog for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

item.description: Dimensions of an Amazon catalog item.

package.description: Dimensions of an Amazon catalog item in its packaging.

ItemIdentifiers.description: Identifiers associated with the item in the Amazon catalog, such as UPC and EAN identifiers.

ItemIdentifiersByMarketplace.description: Identifiers associated with the item in the Amazon catalog for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

identifiers.description: Identifiers associated with the item in the Amazon catalog for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

ItemIdentifier.description: Identifier associated with the item in the Amazon catalog, such as a UPC or EAN identifier.

identifierType.description: Type of identifier, such as UPC, EAN, or ISBN.

ItemImages.description: Images for an item in the Amazon catalog.

ItemImagesByMarketplace.description: Images for an item in the Amazon catalog for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

images.description: Images for an item in the Amazon catalog for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

ItemImage.description: Image for an item in the Amazon catalog.

variant.description: Variant of the image, such as `MAIN` or `PT01`.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Main image for the item.
Other image #1 for the item.
Other image #2 for the item.
Other image #3 for the item.
Other image #4 for the item.
Other image #5 for the item.
Other image #6 for the item.
Other image #7 for the item.
Other image #8 for the item.
Swatch image for the item.

link.description: Link, or URL, for the image.

height.description: Height of the image in pixels.

width.description: Width of the image in pixels.

ItemProductTypes.description: Product types associated with the Amazon catalog item.

ItemProductTypeByMarketplace.description: Product type associated with the Amazon catalog item for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

productType.description: Name of the product type associated with the Amazon catalog item.

ItemSalesRanks.description: Sales ranks of an Amazon catalog item.

ItemSalesRanksByMarketplace.description: Sales ranks of an Amazon catalog item for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

classificationRanks.description: Sales ranks of an Amazon catalog item for an Amazon marketplace by classification.

displayGroupRanks.description: Sales ranks of an Amazon catalog item for an Amazon marketplace by website display group.

ItemClassificationSalesRank.description: Sales rank of an Amazon catalog item by classification.

classificationId.description: Identifier of the classification associated with the sales rank.

title.description: Title, or name, of the sales rank.

link.description: Corresponding Amazon retail website link, or URL, for the sales rank.

ItemDisplayGroupSalesRank.description: Sales rank of an Amazon catalog item by website display group.

websiteDisplayGroup.description: Name of the website display group associated with the sales rank

title.description: Title, or name, of the sales rank.

link.description: Corresponding Amazon retail website link, or URL, for the sales rank.

ItemSummaries.description: Summary details of an Amazon catalog item.

ItemSummaryByMarketplace.description: Summary details of an Amazon catalog item for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

adultProduct.description: Identifies an Amazon catalog item is intended for an adult audience or is sexual in nature.

autographed.description: Identifies an Amazon catalog item is autographed by a player or celebrity.

brand.description: Name of the brand associated with an Amazon catalog item.

browseClassification.description: Classification (browse node) associated with an Amazon catalog item.

color.description: Name of the color associated with an Amazon catalog item.

contributors.description: Individual contributors to the creation of an item, such as the authors or actors.

itemClassification.description: Classification type associated with the Amazon catalog item.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Represents a standard standalone or a variation child item in the Amazon catalog.
Represents an item in the Amazon catalog that is not `BASE_PRODUCT`, `PRODUCT_BUNDLE`, or `VARIATION_PARENT`.
Represents a parent Amazon catalog item representing a bundle of items.
Represents a parent Amazon catalog item grouping child items into a variation family.

itemName.description: Name, or title, associated with an Amazon catalog item.

manufacturer.description: Name of the manufacturer associated with an Amazon catalog item.

memorabilia.description: Identifies an Amazon catalog item is memorabilia valued for its connection with historical events, culture, or entertainment.

modelNumber.description: Model number associated with an Amazon catalog item.

packageQuantity.description: Quantity of an Amazon catalog item in one package.

partNumber.description: Part number associated with an Amazon catalog item.

releaseDate.description: First date on which an Amazon catalog item is shippable to customers.

size.description: Name of the size associated with an Amazon catalog item.

style.description: Name of the style associated with an Amazon catalog item.

tradeInEligible.description: Identifies an Amazon catalog item is eligible for trade-in.

websiteDisplayGroup.description: Identifier of the website display group associated with an Amazon catalog item.

websiteDisplayGroupName.description: Display name of the website display group associated with an Amazon catalog item.

ItemVariationTheme.description: Variation theme indicating the combination of Amazon item catalog attributes that define the variation family.

attributes.description: Names of the Amazon catalog item attributes associated with the variation theme.

theme.description: Variation theme indicating the combination of Amazon item catalog attributes that define the variation family.

ItemRelationships.description: Relationships by marketplace for an Amazon catalog item (for example, variations).

ItemRelationshipsByMarketplace.description: Relationship details for the Amazon catalog item for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

ItemRelationship.description: Relationship details for an Amazon catalog item.

childAsins.description: Identifiers (ASINs) of the related items that are children of this item.

parentAsins.description: Identifiers (ASINs) of the related items that are parents of this item.

variationTheme.description: For "VARIATION" relationships, variation theme indicating the combination of Amazon item catalog attributes that define the variation family.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The Amazon catalog item in the request is a variation parent or variation child of the related item(s) indicated by ASIN.
The Amazon catalog item in the request is a package container or is contained by the related item(s) indicated by ASIN.

ItemVendorDetailsCategory.description: Product category or subcategory associated with an Amazon catalog item.

displayName.description: Display name of the product category or subcategory

value.description: Value (code) of the product category or subcategory.

ItemVendorDetails.description: Vendor details associated with an Amazon catalog item. Vendor details are available to vendors only.

ItemVendorDetailsByMarketplace.description: Vendor details associated with an Amazon catalog item for the indicated Amazon marketplace.

brandCode.description: Brand code associated with an Amazon catalog item.

manufacturerCode.description: Manufacturer code associated with an Amazon catalog item.

manufacturerCodeParent.description: Parent vendor code of the manufacturer code.

productCategory.description: Product category associated with an Amazon catalog item.

productGroup.description: Product group associated with an Amazon catalog item.

productSubcategory.description: Product subcategory associated with an Amazon catalog item.

replenishmentCategory.description: Replenishment category associated with an Amazon catalog item.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates non-automated purchasing of inventory that has been allocated to Amazon by the vendor.
Indicates non-automated purchasing of inventory.
Indicates non-automated purchasing of inventory for seasonal items.
Holding queue replenishment status before an item is `NEW_PRODUCT`.
Indicates vendor is out of stock for a longer period of time and cannot backorder.
Indicates a new item that Amazon does not yet stock in inventory.
Indicates assortment parent used for detail page display, not actual items.
Indicates drop ship inventory that Amazon does not stock in its fulfillment centers.
Indicates item is obsolete and should not be ordered.
Indicates active items that should be automatically ordered.

ItemSearchResults.description: Items in the Amazon catalog and search related metadata.

numberOfResults.description:
For `identifiers`-based searches, the total number of Amazon catalog items found. For `keywords`-based searches, the estimated total number of Amazon catalog items matched by the search query (only results up to the page count limit will be returned per request regardless of the number found).

Note: The maximum number of items (ASINs) that can be returned and paged through is 1000.

pagination.description: If available, the `nextToken` and/or `previousToken` values required to return paginated results.

items.description: A list of items from the Amazon catalog.

Pagination.description: When a request produces a response that exceeds the `pageSize`, pagination occurs. This means the response is divided into individual pages. To retrieve the next page or the previous page, you must pass the `nextToken` value or the `previousToken` value as the `pageToken` parameter in the next request. When you receive the last page, there will be no `nextToken` key in the pagination object.

nextToken.description: A token that can be used to fetch the next page.

previousToken.description: A token that can be used to fetch the previous page.

BrandRefinement.description: Description of a brand that can be used to get more fine-grained search results.

numberOfResults.description: The estimated number of results that would still be returned if refinement key applied.

brandName.description: Brand name. For display and can be used as a search refinement.

ClassificationRefinement.description: Description of a classification that can be used to get more fine-grained search results.

numberOfResults.description: The estimated number of results that would still be returned if refinement key applied.

classificationId.description: Identifier for the classification that can be used for search refinement purposes.
